title: Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions & Transportation       Belmont-Paul Women's Equality NM is located on Capitol Hill at the corner of Constitution Avenue and 2nd Street, NE, next to the Hart Senate Office Building. It is a free-standing, federal style brick house surrounded by a black cast-iron fence. The entrance for museum tours and the museum shop is located on 2nd Street with the lift accessible entrance also located on 2nd Street. The doors facing Constitution Avenue are not entrances.  The site is located a short walk from Metro. From the Orange/Blue/Silver lines, use the Capitol South station; from the Red line, use Union Station. 144 Constitution Ave NE 900 Ohio Drive SW Washington, DC 20002    Â   Error: You have supplied an invalid NPMap ID.
